workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.3357448682201757 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.03230572639941359 --weight-decay 0.00043546230596133343 --lr 1e-9 --lr-scheduler triangular --min-lr 1e-10 --max-lr 0.0004549663411486411 --lr-period-updates 80759.3383368581 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.03766452196146919 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
